text: Paul Muhly (born September 7, 1944) p. 927 is an American mathematician. In 2015 he was elected as a Fellow of the American Mathematical Society for his contributions to operator theory as well as mentoring and service to the community. List of Fellows of the American Mathematical Society He has supervised over 20 Ph.D. students. title: Paul Muhly
